snippet: The Hermès Quartet made its New York debut on Wednesday with a Debussy, Schubert and Dutilleux program at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by Paris-based ensemble Hermes Quartet at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Hermès Quartet made its New York debut on Wednesday with a Debussy, Schubert and Dutilleux program at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: Hermès Quartet Makes Its New York Debut at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: A Zest for Peril and Playfulness
headline.print_headline: A Zest for Peril And Playfulness
